subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ahhh the infamous Fish!
author: black bear hollow
full_text:
From what I hear, they're fairly demonic. Nasty. But yes, I'd agree  
they'd revel in any attention.
R. Smith deemed them the Demons of Evp.

Of course - unless you've truly experienced what they are capable of,  
it's hard to judge.

One thing Erland and I noticed, they seemed to pick up on people who  
had exprienced an NDE (near death or death experience). Both Erland &  
I are NDE'ers, though he's now officially on the other side. :)

w.
On Aug 17, 2008, at 4:55 PM, Lisby wrote:

> Demons of EVP--I think that's granting them too much. And it's a  
> title they would revel in. Nasty clever little punks--yeah, that's  
> about right.
>
>
> Ann
